meanings.sent1: The nonemergency situation allowed us to calmly assess the situation.
meanings.sent2: The doctor assured us that it was a nonemergency procedure.
meanings.sent3: The nonemergency nature of the situation made us grateful for the peaceful outcome.
meanings.sent4: Her nonemergency response to the situation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nonemergency status of the issue made it easier to handle.

meanings.definition: Not requiring immediate attention or action.
meanings.sent1: The nonemergency repair could wait until the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The nonemergency meeting was scheduled for next week.
meanings.sent3: His nonemergency request for help was met with understanding.
meanings.sent4: The nonemergency task lingered on the to-do list.
meanings.sent5: The nonemergency situation allowed for careful planning.
